result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Dismissed
PER ADA HANSON, BOOKED BUT NO ATN IN PHOENIX, REQ SENT TO JAIL
ATN req. from Dep. DA Hanson
Sentencing hearing on December 19, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Damontae N Hattix in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Damontae N Hattix in custody.  Matthew J. Hastings for Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue   Enter plea to single count in 14CF360.  14CF1168   to be DRI.  Plea colloquey by Judge.  P-G found G on 14CF360 and 14CF1168 is DRI.  PSI ordered  If a bond request is to be made, a written motion must be filed.  Def. father requests return of the bond that has been posted.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 19, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Authorized warrant, not issued
Status conference on October 24, 2014 at 09:00 am.
NG plea entered.
Reading waived.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Damontae N Hattix in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Damontae N Hattix in custody.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.
Defense requests a bond mod. State objects. 
BTC: Bond mod is denied.  Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Katie Gutowski
Defendant's

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with the victim (person, property, residence or family) in 14CF360.  Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780). May go to court, school and appointments with atty.   Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.
Preliminary hearing on September 24, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Damontae N Hattix in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Damontae N Hattix in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
Def - Reading of complaint is waived, req prelim. 
St - Req bond in 14CF360 mod to $2500 cash and $500 cash on the 1168 file
BTC: Probable cause found - 14CF1168, bond set at $1,000 cash - same cond's as 14CF360 
14CF360 bond set at $1000 cash bond set - same cond's as previously ordered including release for school
Bond forfeiture hearing taken off calendar - $500 is reinstated.
